This plugin helps you to use the right action during the combat. Here is a guide about the different options.
Engage settings

Por favor, no vuelva a iniciar sesión sin cerrar la partida. Pueden ocurrir crashes.

Literally, Rotation Solver helps you to choose the target and then clicks the action for you. So any plugin that interacts with these will affect its decision.

Here is a list of known incompatible plugins:
No se puede ejecutar correctamente el comportamiento que RS quiere hacer.
Engañando al RS al tomar la decisión correcta.
Causa que el juego se crashee.
Many thanks to everyone that is supporting and enjoying the plugin.
Aquí hay unos métodos de calificación para el análisis de la rotación. La mayor parte de estos métodos necesitan tu acción.

This is the count of using last action checking in this rotation. First is average one, second is maximum one. The less the better.
Last used action is not a part of information from the game, it is recorded by player or author. 
It can't accurately describe the current state of combat, which may make this rotation not general. 
For example, clipping the gcd, death, take some status that grated by some action off manually, etc.

This is the count of using combat time in this rotation. First is average one, second is maximum one. The less the better.
Combat time is not a part of information from the game, it is recorded by player or author. 
It can't accurately describe the current state of combat, which may make this rotation not general.
For example, engaged by others in the party, different gcd time, etc.

Para personalizar cuando Rotation Solver usa una acción específica automáticamente, clica en un icono de acción en la lista de la izquierda. Abajo, pondrás las condiciones para cuando esta acción específica es usada. Cada acción tendrá un set de condiciones para reemplazar el comportamiento por defecto de la rotación.
Minimum target time to kill at which the ability will be used.
The list is in Target - Hostile

Minimum number of targets that are needed for this ability to be used.
Should this action check if it was not already used by another player.
How many gcds are needed to add the status.
La relación HP para curar automáticamente

Forced Conditions have a higher priority. If Forced Conditions are met, Disabled Conditions will be ignored.
No Target Conditions have a higher priority. If No Target Conditions are met, Priority Target Conditions will be ignored.

Condiciones para el uso automático de la acción que están siendo desactivadas.

Conditions for the target that you don't want to target.

In RS, it means the time from sending the action request to receiving the using success message from the server.

RotationSolver.Basic.Data.StateCommandTy: Start the addon in Manual mode. You need to choose the target manually. This will bypass any engage settings that you have set up and will start attacking immediately once something is targeted.
Stop the addon. Always remember to turn it off when it is not in use!
Start the addon in Auto mode. When out of combat or when combat starts, switches the target according to the set condition.

RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: All targets when solo, or previously engaged.
RotationSolver.Punchline: Analyses combat information in every frame and finds the best action.
RotationSolver.Description:
Analyses combat information in every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.

Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.

It is designed for GENERAL COMBAT, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
